mapper.select: SELECT r.no no, p.name productName, p.no productNo, r.review, r.star, r.taker_no takerNo, t.name takerName, r.regdate, m.profile_img MemberProfileImg, t.nickname takerNickname, p.giver_no giverNo FROM products p, reviews r, takers t, members m WHERE p.no=r.product_no AND r.taker_no=t.no AND m.no =t.no AND p.no = #{productNo}
